Hey guys!
Zonerich will be off for Chinese New Year from Feb 6-18.
We wanted to take a moment to express our heartfelt gratitude for your continued support and partnership.
May this Chinese New Year bring you and your loved ones immense joy, good health, and prosperity. Like the vibrant fireworks that light up the night sky, we hope the coming year is filled with moments that dazzle and delight.
We are excited about the opportunities the new year brings, and we look forward to serving you with even greater dedication. Your trust has been the cornerstone of our success, and we are committed to delivering excellence in all that we do.

Guangzhou Zonerich Business Machine Co Ltd
Computer Hardware Manufacturing
Guangzhou, Guangdong
185 followers
About us
GUANGZHOU ZONERICH BUSINESS MACHINE CO.,LTD was founded in 2001, and has been an innovative designer and manufacturer POS printers, electronic cash registers, commercial POS touch terminals and peripherals. Currently, Zonerich employs over 300 employees and has expanded to 100,000 square feet of production facilities with automated production lines and certified by ISO 9001-2008. Zonerich has successfully launched POS products more than 50 countries world-wide and is committed to providing global customers with top quality products and services.
